Item: license statement (incl instructions for how to attribute)
How do documents self-identify that they conform?
Online validation tool - polish and make production-ready
caption/description/label mixed up for figures, tables, boxes
Keywords for sub article items eg figures, tables, videos
Metadata of images - in binary of the image file (or elsewhere)
Author metadata e.g present addresses, on behalf of, group authorship
Funding (linking to individual authors, FundRef etc)
Using NLM defined article types in article-type attribute and expanding the list
Persuade databases to use Journals' own IDs/ensure consistent abbreviation/capitalisation
Other use cases of contrib (co-first author etc)
Related article tagging (within journal, without, example JATS list of types?)
